complaint: Large pothole causing vehicle damage near Gokul Road, Hubli
solution: PWD team patched the pothole and scheduled permanent resurfacing next week.

complaint: Garbage accumulation behind Saptapur market - not collected for 4 days
solution: Sanitation crew cleared site, placed temporary bins and added an extra pickup for 7 days.

complaint: Water supply disrupted in Old Hubli from mainline leak
solution: WSD repaired pipe, provided 2 tanker runs; restored supply. Follow-up leak test passed.

complaint: Street light not working at Unkal Cross near bus stop
solution: ESCOM team replaced fixture; verified lumens and timing.
